content: So again, we said the magic of marketplace, how you guys will know we're successful is that our services revenue will outpace our GTV growth, because you're going to see attachments of services much quicker, obviously having an all new vertical to attach services to be the insights or our own services or third-parties, it's incredible and then you move to the kind of mid and long-term and then you can leverage that scale of the global marketplace incredibly, whether you want to think about return on any technology investments now being spread across a much bigger ecosystem and ability to accelerate innovation, one plus -- that's why we're so confident that one plus one equals four.
